title: Capture Your Life with a Vivitar Action Camera
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/15/2015 @ 6:37 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Vivitar 
EDISON, N.J., Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Vivitar debuts two versatile, rugged and affordable action cameras at Wal-Mart, the Vivitar DVR786HD and the DVR783HD just in time for holiday shopping. Competitively priced, these Vivitar action cameras are the perfect gift for teens on the go, adventurers looking for exciting POV video footage, and families who want to capture every moment of that holiday vacation. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20151014/277158 
Featuring a waterproof enclosure, both the Vivitar DVR786 and DVR783 are submersible up to 30-feet to make capturing videos underwater a snap. Both action cameras include a preview screen for instant viewing, use a rechargeable Lithium Ion battery for convenient charging and record to a Micro SD for many expandable memory options to record every moment. With the Vivitar Action cameras users can count on Vivitar's industry-leading lens design and image processing technology to render crisp, clear footage in the toughest conditions. 
Designed to capture all family adventures in dynamic, full high definition 1080p at 30 fps, the Vivitar DVR786 will also capture 12MP still images and includes an easy-to-use wireless remote control. The remote allows for easy on demand recording so consumers capture only the footage and still shots they want with the touch of a button, without having to stop or fumble with the camera. This conserves storage capacity and saves time in the video editing process. 
Available now for $59.99, and $39.99, the Vivitar action cameras include a charging cable, waterproof case and both an ATV/bike mount and helmet mount bracket right in the box. This is perfect for hands-free recording without having to buy more mounts. 
For more information about the new Vivitar action cameras, visit www.vivitar.com or buy it now at www.Walmart.com and www.Amazon.com . 
Check out Vivitar's Facebook page for a chance to win a DVR786! Five lucky fans will receive an HD action camera from Vivitar - just submit your favorite homemade videos! Visit www.Facebook/VivitarOfficial for more details. 
About Vivitar 
Vivitar is a leading international consumer electronics manufacturer with a rich heritage of technology innovation and affordability dating back to 1938. Vivitar products include digital still cameras, action cams, photo accessories and mobile accessories which are designed to meet the needs of today's families. Vivitar is headquartered in Edison, New Jersey, with additional offices across the United Kingdom, Latin America, Canada and Hong Kong, and global retail distribution spanning more than 100,000 locations in both mass market and specialty channels. For more information, visit www.vivitar.com .
